metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML tables can have cells that span over multiple rows and/or columns.
content.html: HTML tables can have cells that span over multiple rows and/or columns.

content.text: To make a cell span over multiple columns, use the colspan attribute:
content.html: To make a cell span over multiple columns, use the colspan attribute:

content.code_html:
<table>
  <tr>
    <th colspan="2">Name</th>
    <th>Age</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Jill</td>
    <td>Smith</td>
    <td>43</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>Eve</td>
    <td>Jackson</td>
    <td>57</td>
  </tr>
</table>

content.text: Note: The value of the colspan attribute represents the number of columns to span.
content.html: Note: The value of the colspan attribute represents the number of columns to span.

content.text: To make a cell span over multiple rows, use the rowspan attribute:
content.html: To make a cell span over multiple rows, use the rowspan attribute:

content.code_html:
<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Name</th>
    <td>Jill</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th rowspan="2">Phone</th>
    <td>555-1234</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>555-8745</td>
</tr>
</table>

content.text: Note: The value of the rowspan attribute represents the number of rows to span.
content.html: Note: The value of the rowspan attribute represents the number of rows to span.

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page
What is the correct HTML attribute for specifying how many rows a cell should span?
content.html: What is the correct HTML attribute for specifying how many rows a cell should span?
